directions: Place pineapple chunks and red jalapeño slices in medium bowl. Press firmly on solids with muddler or back of wooden spoon until mashed. Mix in tequila, lime juice, Simple Syrup , and Cointreau, then 1 cup ice. Stir to blend well. Strain into large glass measuring cup. Divide remaining ice between 2 tall glasses. Pour Margarita mixture over.
ingredients: 4 slices red jalapeño chile with seeds
2 tablespoons Cointreau or other orange liqueur
title: Pineapple-Chile Margarita
